game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve a sacred scroll hidden within the temple and bring it back to the village elder.
game.description: The temple is said to be filled with ancient traps and puzzles. Be careful not to trigger any of them, as they may lead to your demise.
game.reward: A magical amulet that grants +10 to strength

task.objective: Enter the temple and navigate through the first chamber.
task.description: The chamber is filled with a thick fog. Use your wits to find the exit.
task.location: The Temple of the Moon Goddess, Entrance Chamber

task.objective: Solve the pressure plate puzzle in the second chamber.
task.description: Step on the correct plates in a specific order to unlock the door.
task.location: The Temple of the Moon Goddess, Second Chamber

task.objective: Climb the ladder in the third chamber and retrieve the scroll.
task.description: The ladder is slippery. Be careful not to fall.
task.location: The Temple of the Moon Goddess, Third Chamber
